resources.string: According to The NEA FAQ, the following items can be easily recycled

These items are NOT recyclable:
 -Food
 -Liquid Waste
 -Composite materials
 -Light bulbs
 -Ceramics
 -Porcelain
Welcome to the Community! Complete everything below and inspire a greener Singapore!
How did you make your project?

Trashare is a lifestyle application to help people contribute to a greener Singapore!

 In one of their leaflets, the National Environment Agency described the current rate of waste generation in Singapore as needing a new landfill the size of Sentosa in 35 years if it continues.
 So to help fight this we need to recycle NOW.

 -You can use the Community section to find and contribute creative recycling ideas

 -Or the Map to find the nearest recycling bin to you, using a postcode

 -Or simply to find out exactly what materials are recyclable 

 Or all 3! All information comes from the NEA website. Except for the Community section, that should come from you!
